content:
TITLE: JSON-RPC 2.0 Request Object with Positional Parameters
DESCRIPTION: Example of a JSON-RPC 2.0 request object using an array of positional parameters to invoke the 'subtract' method. The request includes the required protocol version, method name, parameters, and a numeric identifier.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tunnckocore/jsonrpc-v2.0-spec/blob/master/jsonrpc-v2-spec.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "subtract",
  "params": [42, 23],
  "id": 1
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: JSON-RPC 2.0 Request Object with Named Parameters
DESCRIPTION: Example of a JSON-RPC 2.0 request object using named parameters in an object to invoke the 'subtract' method. This approach allows for parameters to be specified by name rather than position.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tunnckocore/jsonrpc-v2.0-spec/blob/master/jsonrpc-v2-spec.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "subtract",
  "params": { "subtrahend": 23, "minuend": 42 },
  "id": 3
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: JSON-RPC 2.0 Success Response Object
DESCRIPTION: Example of a successful JSON-RPC 2.0 response object containing the result of the method invocation. The response includes the protocol version, result value, and the same ID from the original request.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tunnckocore/jsonrpc-v2.0-spec/blob/master/jsonrpc-v2-spec.md#2025-04-18_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": 19,
  "id": 1
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: JSON-RPC 2.0 Error Response Object
DESCRIPTION: Example of a JSON-RPC 2.0 error response object indicating a method not found error. The error object includes a code, message, and matches the ID from the original request.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tunnckocore/jsonrpc-v2.0-spec/blob/master/jsonrpc-v2-spec.md#2025-04-18_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "error": { "code": -32601, "message": "Method not found" },
  "id": "1"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: JSON-RPC 2.0 Batch Request
DESCRIPTION: Example of a JSON-RPC 2.0 batch request containing multiple request objects sent as an array. This includes regular requests with IDs, a notification without an ID, and an invalid request object.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tunnckocore/jsonrpc-v2.0-spec/blob/master/jsonrpc-v2-spec.md#2025-04-18_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
[
  { "jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "sum", "params": [1, 2, 4], "id": "1" },
  { "jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "notify_hello", "params": [7] },
  { "jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "subtract", "params": [42, 23], "id": "2" },
  { "foo": "boo" },
  { "jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "get_data", "id": "9" }
]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: JSON-RPC 2.0 Batch Response
DESCRIPTION: Example of a JSON-RPC 2.0 batch response containing multiple response objects in an array. This includes success responses, error responses for invalid requests, and no response for the notification.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tunnckocore/jsonrpc-v2.0-spec/blob/master/jsonrpc-v2-spec.md#2025-04-18_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
[
  { "jsonrpc": "2.0", "result": 7, "id": "1" },
  { "jsonrpc": "2.0", "result": 19, "id": "2" },
  {
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "error": { "code": -32600, "message": "Invalid Request" },
    "id": null
  },
  {
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "result": ["hello", 5],
    "id": "9"
  }
]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: JSON-RPC 2.0 Notification Request
DESCRIPTION: Example of a JSON-RPC 2.0 notification request which doesn't require a response. This is indicated by the absence of an 'id' field. The server must not reply to notifications.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tunnckocore/jsonrpc-v2.0-spec/blob/master/jsonrpc-v2-spec.md#2025-04-18_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "update",
  "params": [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
}
```
